Clearwater.Anona, Florida:
Anona is an unincorporated area in Pinellas County, Florida, United States.


== History ==
In 1883, Captain John Thomas Lowe made a landing here, with the town getting its name from Anona sweet apples from Key West. At first it was going to be named Lowe's landing but its postmaster, from Cedar Key suggested it was to be Anona.
